articles.description: Moderna will charge governments between $25 and $37 per dose of its COVID-19 vaccine candidate, depending on the amount ordered, Chief Executive Stephane Bancel told German weekly Welt am Sonntag (WamS).
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.author: Kelly Dean
articles.title: Family, community mourn loss of Ballard Co. teen who died from COVID-19 - WSAZ
articles.description: Family and the community described Alexa Rose Veit as a “social butterfly.” She was born in February 2005 with down syndrome and at 14 was diagnosed with Leukemia. A year later, Veit was considered to be in remission from cancer.
articles.content:
BALLARD COUNTY, Ky. (WBKO) - On Wednesday, Governor Beshear announced a 15-year-old from Ballard County with underlying health conditions passed away due to COVID-19.
